items.sentence: The last time I saw Mary she was wearing a pink blouse and a red skirt.
The only concert Tom has ever gone to was the one Mary gave last night.
When you've finished reading that book, put it back where you found it.
If you didn't have to work for the next three weeks, what would you do?
He was making a speech, but he broke off when he heard a strange noise.
Our parents took care of us and now it's our turn to take care of them.
Tom had a sneaking suspicion Mary had met up with John after the party.
Tom knew Mary was very unlikely to be able to do what she wanted to do.
I haven't seen any of my old classmates since I graduated 15 years ago.
If Tom is convicted, he'll likely spend the rest of his life in prison.
